text:
If you've ever asked yourself, "I wonder what the inside of Demi Lovato's house looks like?" (as we all do, obv), now you can actually get the chance to see, because her Hollywood Hills estate just hit the market, and it is good. But like, it should be for $9.4 million, right? Wowza.

The Agency has the listing for the sprawling property, which contains 4 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, and 5,564 square feet on over an acre of land. It's set behind gates, so it's extra private and exclusive, and has the chef's kitchen of our dreams, with state-of-the-art appliances, marble countertops, and is open to the backyard, where you'll find a zero-edge pool, grill, and gazebo.

According to TMZ, the house where Demi Lovato lived in California was put up for sale for 9.5 million dollars. In 2016, Demi bought the house for 8.3 million dollars. pic.twitter.com/4kiFAMEkUw — Demi Lovato Team (@DemiTeamTR) September 4, 2018

The home also has an insanely cool "upper club level," with a bar, media room, and huge sky terrace. It's minutes from the Sunset Strip and set right above the Chateau Marmont, so the location is seriously choice.

Our favorite part, though, is hands-down the panoramic city views from the living rooms floor-to-ceiling windows and the sky terrace. You can see all the way from downtown Los Angeles to the Pacific Ocean, and it's giving us all the La La Land feels.

See the full listing at The Agency.

Follow House Beautiful on Instagram.
authors: Sienna Livermore Is A Commerce Editor At Hearst Covering Best-Selling Products
Things You Just Can'T Live Without.
